flawed_nl_solution:
10% + 50% = 60% of the chips in the jar are not green.
So, 100% - 60% = 40% of the chips are green.
There are 40%/10% = 4 sets of 10% to make 40%.
Hence, there are 3 chips x 4 sets = <<3*4=21>>21 green chips.
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
